title: Topic 003 Question 026
body: You need to configure and publish bot12345678 to answer questions by using the frequently asked questions (FAQ) located at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/ azure/bot-service/bot-service-resources-bot-framework-faq. The solution must use bot%@lab.LabInstance.Id-qna-qna%.
To complete this task, use the Microsoft Bot Framework Composer.
